My Work

Mar 2018 - May 2019

Senior Software Engineer | Wipro Technologies

Constructed a Spring MVC application for tracking and presenting data to client AT&T and automated manual test cases using python which reduces 3x amount of manual work done.

Dec 2016 - Feb 2018

Software Engineer | Wipro Technologies

Maintained and re-engineered Software Defined Networking (SDN) project resulting in 10% time reduction in configuring client devices and Implemented a stand-alone java application “Health Check” which monitors the status of other SDN applications and generates a report which resulted in removal of manual checking process.

Nov 2- Dec 2016

Bart application

Designed a web application which tracks the trains running between source and destination and Integrated googleMap API to show the route on the map. Used react and Spring Boot

Feb 2016 - Mar 2016

Recommendation System

Built an item based recommendation system using React and spring Boot and achieved a RMSE score of 1.08

Mar 2015 - May 2015
